verses.name: Genesis 43:26
verses.text: And when Joseph came home, they brought him the present which was in their hand into the house, and bowed themselves to him to the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 43:27
verses.text: And he asked them of their welfare, and said, Is your father well, the old man of whom ye spake? Is he yet alive?

verses.name: Genesis 43:28
verses.text: And they answered, Thy servant our father is in good health, he is yet alive. And they bowed down their heads, and made obeisance.
